LayoutNode.Content: Junk (would not recommend) Mike — 1 year ago This is the second Fitbit I've purchased and I've had major problems with both. This one would not sync with my iPhone. LayoutNode.Content: (would not recommend) Summertime — 1 year ago The charge is OK but the fitbit dashboard and app is awful. I wanted it mainly for sleep tracking and it's virtually useless for that. All you get is a bar graph with little actual data that you can use.
